clinical_note: 44-year-old male with BMI 63 super-morbid obesity, innumerable gastric fundic gland polyps, Barrett's esophagus, colon tubular adenomas, and a 3.4 cm mesenteric mass concerning for desmoid tumor.

32-year-old male with severe symptomatic anemia, large fungating gastric mass extending into duodenum, juvenile inflammatory polyps throughout colon, and scattered small-bowel telangiectasia on capsule study.
